Select a vein.sentence: The healthcare provider assesses the patient's arms and hands to identify suitable veins for venipuncture.
Select a vein.subject: The healthcare provider

Select a vein.sentence: The healthcare provider palpates the identified veins to evaluate their depth and firmness.
Select a vein.subject: The healthcare provider

Select a vein.sentence: The healthcare provider cleans the selected area with an antiseptic solution to prevent infection.
Select a vein.subject: The healthcare provider

Select a vein.sentence: The healthcare provider uses a tourniquet to engorge the vein and facilitate easier access.
Select a vein.subject: The healthcare provider

Select a vein.sentence: The healthcare provider confirms the selected vein's suitability before proceeding with the venipuncture.
Select a vein.subject: The healthcare provider
